docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic Republic of Congo's largest opposition party said it expelled one of its leaders on Saturday amid infighting that weakens its effort to force President Joseph Kabila to stick to a deal to step down after an election this year.

headline.print_headline: Congo Opposition Party Expels Top Official in Sign of Infighting
headline.main: Congo Opposition Party Expels Top Official in Sign of Infighting

docs.snippet: Democratic Republic of Congo's largest opposition party said it expelled one of its leaders on Saturday amid infighting that weakens its effort to force President Joseph Kabila to stick to a deal to step down after an election this year....

docs.lead_paragraph: Real Madrid overcame the absence of Gareth Bale and Cristiano Ronaldo to romp to a 4-1 win at tiny Eibar on Saturday and provisionally return to the top of La Liga.

headline.print_headline: Real Madrid Thrash Eibar Without Bale and Ronaldo
headline.main: Real Madrid Thrash Eibar Without Bale and Ronaldo

docs.snippet: Real Madrid overcame the absence of Gareth Bale and Cristiano Ronaldo to romp to a 4-1 win at tiny Eibar on Saturday and provisionally return to the top of La Liga....

docs.lead_paragraph: Turkish officials said that an aircraft believed to belong to the Syrian military crashed near the Turkey-Syria border Saturday, with the Syrian opposition claiming to Turkish media they were responsible for shooting the plane down.

headline.print_headline: Plane Believed to Be Syrian Crashes Near Turkey-Syria Border
headline.main: Plane Believed to Be Syrian Crashes Near Turkey-Syria Border

docs.snippet: Turkish officials said that an aircraft believed to belong to the Syrian military crashed near the Turkey-Syria border Saturday, with the Syrian opposition claiming to Turkish media they were responsible for shooting the plane down....

docs.lead_paragraph: A warplane probably belonging to the Syrian air force crashed on the Turkish side of the border with Syria on Saturday and the pilots appeared to have bailed out, a local Turkish governor was quoted as saying.

headline.print_headline: Turkey Says Warplane, Probably Syrian, Crashed Near Border
headline.main: Turkey Says Warplane, Probably Syrian, Crashed Near Border

docs.snippet: A warplane probably belonging to the Syrian air force crashed on the Turkish side of the border with Syria on Saturday and the pilots appeared to have bailed out, a local Turkish governor was quoted as saying....

docs.lead_paragraph: From basketball innovator to coaching flameout, Mike D’Antoni has survived the roller coaster of the NBA and landed back in the league’s good graces.

docs.lead_paragraph: Drugmakers Sanofi and Regeneron said on Saturday results from a one-year test of their Dupixent product aimed at adults with eczema or moderate-to-severe atopic dermatitis (AD) had been positive.

docs.lead_paragraph: Embattled French presidential candidate Francois Fillon was under growing pressure to quit the race on Saturday as his party leaders brought forward a meeting to discuss the situation and former allies shied away from a planned rally to support him.

headline.print_headline: France's Fillon Under Fire as Party Chiefs Bring Forward Crisis Meeting
headline.main: France's Fillon Under Fire as Party Chiefs Bring Forward Crisis Meeting

docs.lead_paragraph: A New York man repeatedly traveled to the Middle East to try to join the Islamic State or another extremist group in Syria and later told authorities he'd been prepared to strap on a bomb to sacrifice himself for jihad, prosecutors said Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Prosecutors: NY Man Aimed to Fight With Islamic Extremists
headline.main: Prosecutors: NY Man Aimed to Fight With Islamic Extremists
